name: 77 Wizard
flavor: The Exo called Gaunt is a gunsmith famous for his Wizards.

name: ETHER NOVA~
flavor: Thesan FR4: Hasten the ~SIVA replication~

name: Saladin's Vigil
flavor: "I will keep your memories alive." —Lord Saladin

name: Stellar Vestige
flavor: "Perhaps that is all we are." —Parables of the Allspring

name: The Branded Lord
flavor: Forged in honor of Radegast, he who saw in the flames a kingdom of iron, waiting to be forged.

name: Each New Day
flavor: …is better than the last.

name: Ex Astris
flavor: Astra inclinant, sed non obligant.

name: The Waiting
flavor: An advanced energy weapon, named and sanctified by the Future War Cult's leaders.

name: Worlds to Come 001
flavor: A fusion rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: 77 Wizard
flavor: The Exo called Gaunt is a gunsmith famous for his Wizards.

name: Amethyst Reign-99
flavor: C'est magnifique!

name: Andromeda
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the princess of the night sky.

name: Angelic Acid
flavor: Cast out the world's demons with this needle-nosed plasma lash.

name: Ashraven's Flight
flavor: An advanced energy weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Badlands-FR4
flavor: Stark red rock. Arid sun. Long shadows. Find your spot.

name: Bronzed Nox Volo V
flavor: A well-balanced Cassoid firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Caldera-FR1
flavor: Boiling air. Obscuring steam. Calm nerves.

name: Dämmerung FR3
flavor: Manufactured with foamed spinmetal, the FR3's lightweight build makes it popular in rough terrain.

name: Dämmerung FR5
flavor: The snubfire FR5, built around a nugget of null-mass, offers superb agility and power.

name: Darkblade's Spite
flavor: "In the Hive ways of old he challenged Oryx. He failed." —Eris Morn

name: Elevating Vision
flavor: Find a way to the top.

name: Eosphoros FR4
flavor: Dawn is within our sights.

name: Exile's Curse
flavor: It's a blessing in disguise.

name: Feral Spark FR6
flavor: Foaming at the mouth.

name: Final Rest II
flavor: An advanced energy weapon modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Futile Gesture
flavor: If you like the weapon, then the name's talking about the enemy. If you don't...

name: Give/Take Equation
flavor: As good as you get. As much as you can. All of the time.

name: Harrowed Midha's Reckoning
flavor: "I see now that everything dies. Even...even memory." —Midha, Consort of Stars

name: Heath-FR3
flavor: Sloping hills. Clawing brambles. Bitter herbs.

name: Helios FR5
flavor: Coiled with fieldweave conductors, the Helios FR5 is portable hellfire.

name: Hitchhiker FR4
flavor: A fusion rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Light of the Abyss
flavor: In the dark beyond the Hellmouth there is a terrible need for light.

name: LIGHT/Beware
flavor: More light! More light!

name: Long Far Gone
flavor: But I still remember.

name: Midha's Reckoning
flavor: "I see now that everything dies. Even...even memory." —Midha, Consort of Stars

name: Murmur
flavor: "The Hive have learned our secrets. Take them back with fire AND lightning." -Eris

name: Murmur
flavor: "The Hive have learned our secrets. Take them back with fire AND lightning." -Eris

name: Nox Acror IV
flavor: It is an unbinding, a tearing, a siphoning. That is the power of your hand.

name: Nox Astur III
flavor: Let your mind be fleet and subtle as the night-soaring hawk.

name: Nox Cantor II
flavor: Directed energy weapon with a short charge cycle. The NCII is a multirole design that feeds on hydrogen isotope reactant.

name: Nox Cantor II
flavor: The well-balanced NCIII fusion rifle balances power with ease of manufacture.

name: Nox Cantor V
flavor: The NCV has an augmented firing system, allowing for in-field customization.

name: Nox Crocia I
flavor: For you see beyond the fabric of night.

name: Nox Fury V
flavor: The NFV offers a multirole platform wired for punishment.

name: Nox Inergia IV
flavor: The energies of the universe are eager to heed your call.

name: Nox Praeli III
flavor: All that is dark is not Darkness.

name: Nox Revus II
flavor: Directed energy weapon with a short charge cycle. The NRII uses neodymium discharge clamps for more precise fire.

name: Omolon Test FR1
flavor: Omolon prototype. Use in the Crucible to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

name: Painted Helios FR4
flavor: A quick-firing Omolon fusion rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Panta Rhei
flavor: Everything flows.

name: Perun's Fire
flavor: An energy weapon forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Plan C
flavor: Good fighters have contingency plans. Great fighters don't need them.

name: PLUG ONE.1
flavor: Move with the current.

name: Pocket Infinity
flavor: You cannot shake the feeling that this is less a weapon than a doorway.

name: Praetorian Foil
flavor: Erase the future.

name: Primed Nox Revus IV
flavor: An advanced Cassoid fusion rifle with extended range, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Prism Schism
flavor: Just look at all the pretty lights!

name: Prost FR2
flavor: Directed energy weapon with a short charge cycle. The Prost's cut-down projector enables rapid fire.

name: Prost FR3
flavor: Wired for confrontation, the Prost FR3 uses a fast-snap chamber for rapid fire.

name: Purifier VII
flavor: Executor-issued energy weapon for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Queenbreakers' Bow
flavor: Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.

name: Servant of Askor
flavor: Burn away the ether.

name: Silvered Eos FR4
flavor: A quick-firing Omolon fusion rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: SK5 Type-Null
flavor: A multirole Vanguard-issue fusion rifle, modified for enhanced performance.

name: Sleeper Simulant
flavor: Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.

name: Snakebite Surgeon
flavor: The venom numbs the burn.

name: Solas FR2
flavor: Directed energy weapon with a short charge cycle. The lightweight Solas is built for close quarters.

name: Solas FR5
flavor: This FR5 variant contains a hard-wrapped induction system to optimize its charge.

name: Spindevil 3AA
flavor: This crisply accurate fusion rifle pins its performance on a mastercraft field muzzle.

name: Split Shifter Pro
flavor: Combat plasma discharge is no matter for amateurs.

name: Susanoo
flavor: The fearsome storms of today become the healing waters of tomorrow.

name: Techeun Force
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Techeun Force
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Techeun Force
flavor: A Techeun's body shimmers with electronic implants and augments.

name: Techeun Rage
flavor: We honor your sacrifice.

name: Telesto
flavor: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

name: Tengoku FR1
flavor: Fusion Rifles are directed-energy weapons with a short charge cycle. The FR1 is a common multirole design.

name: Tengoku FR2
flavor: Fusion Rifles are directed-energy weapons with a short charge cycle. The FR2 is a multirole design built to kill swarms of light targets.

name: Tengoku FR2a
flavor: Fusion Rifles are directed-energy weapons with a short charge cycle. The FR2a is a multirole design built to kill swarms of light targets.

name: That Beautiful Glow
flavor: Don't go into the light!

name: The Calming
flavor: An energy weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Frenzy
flavor: An advanced energy weapon, augmented, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Trolley Problem
flavor: Pull the lever. It's the right thing to do.

name: The Vacancy
flavor: An advanced energy weapon, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Vortex
flavor: An advanced energy weapon, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: Thesan FR4
flavor: Hasten the dawn with the new Omolon Thesan FR4.

name: Tundra-FR3
flavor: White skies. Unyielding ground. Misted breath. Just one shot.

name: Vex Mythoclast
flavor: ...a causal loop within the weapon's mechanism, suggesting that the firing process somehow binds space and time into…
